resources.string: All existing images will be deleted，confirm？
Go to settings? (Press \"Yes\" to settings page, \"No\" to play images)
Hide prompt dialog as device charged

\"Valybe\" is an Android app to play images, which is to display images dynamically, constantly and periodically. Users could set images and duration of each image. The app makes an Android device work as a digital photo frame. It can also be regarded as an screen saver when devices charged.

Copy images to the directory \"valybe/image/\" in the SD card Storage. It is no need to modify names of these images manually. Only images in \".jpg\" and \".png\" format can be recognized. Images with other extensions and files in other format will be deleted as Valybe runs.
Tianwei Liu . Dalian University of Technology
